sn55.11:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati rājakārāme.
sn55.11:1.2: Atha kho sahassabhikkhunisaṃgho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.11:2.1: “Catūhi kho, bhikkhuniyo, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.11:2.3: Idha, bhikkhuniyo, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.11:2.4: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.11:2.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti, akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
sn55.11:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhuniyo, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
